pages.text: Seeping Shoes can be worn in the foot slot and offer low levels of protection. They can be dyes and $(item)Enchanted$()$(p)If the wearer is standing on solid ground and affected by the $(item)Poison$() effect, the shoes will neutralize it by seeping it into the ground, causing a $(item)Bone Meal$() effect.

pages.title: Other Properties
pages.text: Seeping Shoes will turn invisible when the player is invisible, and can be repaired by crafting them with four $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l) or by combining them with $(item)Leather$() into an $(item)Anvil$().
